text: The Men's sprint competition at the 2018 UCI Track Cycling World Championships was held on 2 and 3 March 2018.ScheduleStart list ==Results== ===Qualifying=== The top four riders advanced directly to the 1/8 finals; places 5 to 28 advanced to the 1/16 final.Qualifying results {|class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
